label: MINI KEYPAD RFID
description: Keypad with alarm activation rfid tag

1.label: Association
1.description: The Association Command Class is used to associate the TagReader to other devices. When a tag or code is read, the TagReader will send a notification to the Z‐Wave devices in its association group. It will also report the state of the tamper alarm to the

1.label: Set to default
1.description: Set all configuration to factory settings

2.label: Feedback time
2.description: To configure the time the beep is automatically turned off in seconds.

4.label: Feedback beeps per second
4.description: To configure the number of beeps per second. Every beep is fixed about 10ms.

options.label: Z‐Wave chip is always on to request
